snippet: RATNER--Michael. The Bard College community mourns its friend and generous supporter Michael Ratner, father of Ana '12 and champion of the Bard Prison Initiative and our Human Rights Project. We extend our deepest condolences to Karen, Ana, Jake, and the entire family. Charles P. Stevenson Jr., Chair David E. Schwab II '52, Chair Emeritus Leon Botstein, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. The Bard College community mourns its friend and generous supporter Michael Ratner, father of Ana '12 and champion of the Bard Prison Initiative and our Human Rights Project. We extend our deepest condolences to Karen, Ana, Jake, and the entire family. Charles P. Stevenson Jr., Chair David E. Schwab II '52, Chair Emeritus Leon Botstein, President 1/3
